definition: to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request

sentences.english: It is reported that the common law at the G8 summit, also urged the Russian mediation.
sentences.chinese: 據悉，英美法在G8峯會上也促請俄羅斯進行調停。

sentences.english: Teng urged the Cabinet to censure Musa for making such a threat.
sentences.chinese: 他也促請內閣譴責慕沙發表具有威脅性的言論。

sentences.english: Boccanegra urges the city council to preserve peace with Venice.
sentences.chinese: 波卡涅拉促請市議會維護與威尼斯的和平。

sentences.english: Many people have urged the government to resurrect the home ownership scheme.
sentences.chinese: 很多人促請政府令居者有其屋計劃復活。
